Polytechnic Courses Visualisation Tool

03 Oct 2019

A personal project of mine that has been on the back burner for a while. Finally I got it completed (Sort of). This is a cool visualisation tool that consolidates all diploma courses available at our 5 local Singapore polytechnics. Data sources from data.gov.sg and polytechnic.edu.sg.

You want to spice up your resume but can't afford to buy a hosting service and domain to host your personal website. How do you even show your capabilities? Github has the answer.
